hero.title: [PT] The Ultimate Discord Bot
hero.subtitle: [PT] Powerful moderation, fun commands, and endless customization for your server.

features.title: [PT] Features
features.subtitle: [PT] Everything you need to manage and enhance your Discord server

moderation.title: [PT] Moderation
moderation.description: [PT] Powerful tools to keep your server safe with auto-moderation, warnings, and more.

fun.title: [PT] Fun Commands
fun.description: [PT] Games, jokes, memes, and interactive commands to keep your community engaged.

leveling.title: [PT] Leveling System
leveling.description: [PT] Reward active members with points, levels, and custom ranks.

extensions.title: [PT] Custom Extensions
extensions.description: [PT] Create or install custom commands and features from our marketplace.

music.title: [PT] Music
music.description: [PT] High-quality music playback with DJ controls and audio filters.

ai.title: [PT] AI Chat
ai.description: [PT] Intelligent conversations powered by multiple AI providers.

cta.title: [PT] Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: [PT] Add {{botName}} to your server in seconds.

faq.title: [PT] Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: [PT] Yes! All core features are completely free. Premium tiers unlock extras like Music and AI chat.
faq.q2: [PT] How do I set up the bot?
faq.a2: [PT] Click 'Add to Server', select your server, and you're done! Use the dashboard to customize.
faq.a3: [PT] Extensions are custom commands you can create or install from the community gallery.

servers.title: [PT] Select a Server
servers.noServers: [PT] You don't have any servers to manage.

membership.title: [PT] Premium Membership
membership.subtitle: [PT] Unlock powerful features for your server

403.title: [PT] Access Denied
403.message: [PT] You don't have permission to access this page.

404.title: [PT] Page Not Found
404.message: [PT] The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

500.title: [PT] Server Error
500.message: [PT] Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
